Glen Innes arrest: Man knocks gun from fleeing driver’s hand https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/glen-innes-arrest-man-knocks-gun-from-fleeing-drivers-hand/RKMVYFL3NZEEZKA6PP7EKJEA4Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/glen-innes-arrest-man-knocks-gun-from-fleeing-drivers-hand/RKMVYFL3NZEEZKA6PP7EKJEA4Y/ Jaime LythHead Hunter associate faces host of charges after dramatic armed stand-off Wed, 20 Nov 2024 22:06:19 +0000 Footage has emerged of the dramatic arrest of an armed man driving erratically in Glen Innes, which left one person in a serious condition. The video shows a black car driving on the grass in a reserve near Leybourne Circle. Photo / via video
Hamilton bar staff threatened with gun, robbed https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/hamilton-bar-staff-threatened-with-gun-robbed/WB24632GS5ETNOCOI3I5S2ZKRE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/hamilton-bar-staff-threatened-with-gun-robbed/WB24632GS5ETNOCOI3I5S2ZKRE/ Police are appealing for information after the robbery. Wed, 20 Nov 2024 21:45:53 +0000 Police are seeking witnesses, CCTV or dashcam footage of a stolen silver Toyota Ractis, registration number JAK624, driven by the robber.
NZDF gunner who drowned in Manawatū River rescuing dog remembered as ‘talented young man’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/manawatu-guardian/news/manawatu-river-search-police-find-missing-nzdf-mans-body/DKSXJUR7N5F3ZDWNHM7BJSCLHY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/manawatu-guardian/news/manawatu-river-search-police-find-missing-nzdf-mans-body/DKSXJUR7N5F3ZDWNHM7BJSCLHY/ Chief of Army says gunner's death is being felt across Ngāti Tūmatauenga and wider NZDF. Wed, 20 Nov 2024 21:44:31 +0000 NZ Defence Force Army Gunner Nikau Minhinnick Gill drowned after he fell into the Manawatū River. Emergency services were called to Ahimate Park around 1.35pm. Photo / NZDF
Letters: Senior citizens deserve better healthcare; abolish Auckland’s council-controlled organisations https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/letters-senior-citizens-deserve-better-healthcare-abolish-aucklands-council-control-organizations/T73SNJRS2NEBNKTIQ3K5J3TH4E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/letters-senior-citizens-deserve-better-healthcare-abolish-aucklands-council-control-organizations/T73SNJRS2NEBNKTIQ3K5J3TH4E/ OPINION: 'Please Mayor, abolish AT and reform the other CCOs just as soon as you can.' Wed, 20 Nov 2024 21:38:54 +0000 'It is a sad state of affairs when those who have given so much in the past to their country now lie in their homes in pain waiting, waiting and waiting.'
Hawke’s Bay Magpies’ Folau Fakatava chases second NPC medal https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hawkes-bay-magpies-folau-fakatava-chases-second-npc-medal/QFE7JSNX55GE3NQ2VR3XKISU74/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hawkes-bay-magpies-folau-fakatava-chases-second-npc-medal/QFE7JSNX55GE3NQ2VR3XKISU74/ The Magpies half was the NPC's player of the year in 2021. He's in line again in 2024. Wed, 20 Nov 2024 21:35:58 +0000 Magpies halfback Folau Fakatava is in contention to become only the second player to win the championship's Duane Monkley Medal twice. Photo / Aaron Gillions: www.photosport.nz
Christchurch street blocked off, car surrounded after bomb scare outside central police station and courthouse https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/christchurch-street-blocked-off-car-surrounded-after-bomb-scare-outside-central-police-station-and-courthouse/ZN5VOFBNSFFLPJER636S3LTEHM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/christchurch-street-blocked-off-car-surrounded-after-bomb-scare-outside-central-police-station-and-courthouse/ZN5VOFBNSFFLPJER636S3LTEHM/ Officers cordon off car outside police station. Wed, 20 Nov 2024 21:32:08 +0000 A Christchurch street was blocked off after a bomb scare this morning. Photo / George Heard
Tauranga woman allegedly four times over limit caught speeding on State Highway 2 https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/tauranga-woman-allegedly-four-times-over-limit-caught-speeding-on-state-highway-2/45RPNGPFX5C75C24MR7BLRYW5I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/tauranga-woman-allegedly-four-times-over-limit-caught-speeding-on-state-highway-2/45RPNGPFX5C75C24MR7BLRYW5I/ The 42-year-old was clocked driving 30km over the speed limit, police say. Wed, 20 Nov 2024 21:28:06 +0000 Police signalled the vehicle to stop on Te Paeroa Road and conducted a roadside breath test.
Hawke’s Bay: Mixed weather for weekend events, including the biggest regatta and beach fishing competition of the year https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hawkes-bay-mixed-weather-for-weekend-events-include-the-biggest-regatta-and-beach-fishing-competition-年度最佳/S45Z5D5HLJEZPII5SGO3NUOPZU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hawkes-bay-mixed-weather-for-weekend-events-include-the-biggest-regatta-and-beach-fishing-competition-年度最佳/S45Z5D5HLJEZPII5SGO3NUOPZU/ Doug LaingSummer Regatta sailing and kahawai fishing are features of a busy weekend.
